Camps Bay’s Hidden Sanctuary. Perched on the slopes of Table Mountain National Park, this rare triple-residence estate delivers breathtaking Atlantic Ocean & panoramic mountain views from the peaks of the Twelve Apostles to Lions Head offering total privacy.

Three residences, a Penthouse, a Villa, and a Studio. Each with its own garden, terrace & pool (approx. 400 sqm each), blend open-plan elegance with the raw beauty of nature.

Five-Bedroom house in Green Point - perfect for luxury living with stunning views.
Web Ref.
RL21482
Floor size
471.00 m²
Monthly Bond Repayment
 R209,609.85
Refined living, this modern marvel is situated in the heart of Green Point, delivering an expansive 471m2 of luxurious living space. Immerse yourself in the breathtaking vistas that unfold at every turn of this remarkable residence, offering sweeping views of the ocean, promenade, and the stadium. This home is a creation masterfully crafted by Bertie Shreuder.

The second floor unveils a versatile two-bedroom, two-bathroom self-contained apartment, currently yielding an impressive return on Airbnb. Also suitable for extended family , this private enclave features a spacious sunny terrace and a pool, offering a retreat separate from the main section of the residence.

On the third floor, the focal point of the home unfolds—an airy three-bedroom, two-bathroom open-plan abode with a vast terrace that gazes over the Atlantic Seaboard. The modular kitchen and interior cupboards elevate the adaptability and flow of the space. Every facet of this dwelling exudes modernity, from the cutting-edge technology encompassing LUX power hybrid inverters with 5kva Lithium Ion batteries to f
properties.pageTitle: 5 Bedroom House For Sale in Green Point | Greeff Christie's International Real Estate

This charming duplex in the heart of the Atlantic Sea Board offers the perfect combination of style, comfort, and functionality. With its elegant wooden floors and thoughtful layout, this home is ideal for those who love to entertain and enjoy coastal living.

The home features three bedrooms, two of which have en-suite bathrooms for added privacy and convenience. As you enter, the open-plan kitchen welcomes you, creating a seamless flow for entertaining. The downstairs bedroom opens directly onto a lush garden and sparkling swimming pool, perfect for relaxing or hosting guests.

Upstairs, you’ll find two spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom includes access to a balcony with partial ocean views—a serene retreat to enjoy sunsets and sea breezes. Beautifully finished wooden flooring flows throughout the home, adding warmt

Sunny Sea Point apartment!
Web Ref.
RL23653

82.00 m²

 R24,909.57
Discover this delightful one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment nestled in a sought-after share block in vibrant Sea Point. Offering a perfect blend of comfort and convenience, this home is ideal for first-time buyers, investors, or those looking to downsize.

The apartment boasts a spacious open-plan living and dining area with large windows, inviting natural light and offering serene city views. The kitchen is neat and functional, with ample cupboard space for your essentials.

The bedroom is generously sized, featuring built-in wardrobes and space for a work-from-home setup. The bathroom includes a walk-in shower and is tastefully finished.

Situated in a well-maintained block, this property is just a short stroll from Sea Point’s bustling promenade, local eateries, and shops. Enjoy the lock-up-and-go lifestyle with easy access

Welcome to Lisdale, where luxury meets the ocean's edge, offering an unparalleled lifestyle with panoramic sea views. This remarkable apartment is the embodiment of sophistication and style, thoughtfully designed to perfection.

Step inside, and you'll find yourself in a spacious, open-plan living area that effortlessly extends onto a generous balcony, where the breathtaking sea views unfold before you. It’s the ideal setting for morning coffees, sunset cocktails, or simply soaking in the coastal ambiance.

The interior radiates timeless elegance and charm. Every element has been meticulously chosen to create an atmosphere that's both welcoming and undeniably chic. The kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring high-end appliances, sleek countertops, and abundant storage, making it as functional as it is beautiful.
